description:
Cut through the darkness with this palm-sized light. Small enough to fit into the watch pocket on your jeans, the PD25R is an easy way to add a lot of lumens to your EDC. Dual switches give you the flexibility of momentary activation from the tail-cap, or more conventional activation from the side. Compatibility with a single rechargeable 16340 (included) or 1 CR123A battery giving you options on the grid, or off.

  • 6 lighting modes: 5 lumens (70h), 30 lumens (16h), 150 lumens (2.9h), 350 lumens (1.5h), 800 lumens (0.75h – only useable for 3 minutes at a time due to heat buildup) and 800 lumen strobe
  • Onboard USB-C charging port means you no longer need to remove the battery to charge your light (you can still remove the battery)
  • Works with 1 rechargeable 16340 battery or 1 CR123A batteries, giving you convenient power options when travelling or stocking your emergency kit
  • Rugged aluminum body has type-III hard anodizing for an extra level of protection
  • Glass lens is toughened for durability and has anti-reflective coating
  • Momentary activation available from the tail-cap switch. Side-mounted switch cycles through modes
  • LED power indicator on the side-mounted switch lets you know when it's time to replace or charge your battery
  • Regulated output maintains constant brightness throughout battery life
  • 2 position clip works on pocket edges and hat brims
  • In the box: PD25R, ARB-L16 700mAh 16340 battery, holster, lanyard, spare O-ring, user manual and warranty card
name: Fenix PD25R Rechargeable Flashlight
